title: Teacher conclusion positive skew low variability

content.question: A teacher finds the distribution of scores on a social-cognitive personality assessment to be positively skewed with low variability. On the basis of this information, the teacher would be most justified in concluding which of the following?

choices.label: A small number of students in the class did poorly on the exam.
The exam is not a reliable assessment tool.
Most of her students are of above average ability.

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
